医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
针对癌症中 BRAF 改变的新视角2024 年 7 月 16 日，Oncotarget 第 15 卷发表了一项新的研究观点，题为“针对癌症的多方面 BRAF：新方向”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/New-perspectives-on-targeting-BRAF-alterations-in-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/New-perspectives-on-targeting-BRAF-alterations-in-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=57373bd7-ed83-4e66-8b03-27055a89b8cf Mon, 12 Aug 2024 21:14:55 -0400 New perspectives on targeting BRAF alterations in cancer
伸展和冥想可缓解肝硬化患者的夜间肌肉痉挛患有肝硬化的人可能会发现两种可以进行的活动可以缓解一些症状：伸展运动和冥想。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/Stretching-and-meditation-ease-nocturnal-muscle-cramps-in-cirrhosis-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/Stretching-and-meditation-ease-nocturnal-muscle-cramps-in-cirrhosis-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=59ab51ac-cb25-41da-8e71-cc21eb7ff5f0 Mon, 12 Aug 2024 20:45:59 -0400 Stretching and meditation ease nocturnal muscle cramps in cirrhosis patients
发现儿童 B 细胞急性淋巴细胞白血病复发的新基因组预测因子来自圣裘德儿童研究医院、西雅图儿童医院和儿童肿瘤学小组 (COG) 的科学家们发现了新的遗传变异，这些变异会影响标准风险 B 细胞急性淋巴细胞白血病 (SR B-ALL) 儿童的复发风险，这是最常见的儿童期 B 细胞急性淋巴细胞白血病 (SR B-ALL)。癌症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/New-genomic-predictors-of-relapse-in-childhood-B-cell-acute-lymphoblastic-leukemia-uncovered.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/New-genomic-predictors-of-relapse-in-childhood-B-cell-acute-lymphoblastic-leukemia-uncovered.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1760cdc2-5985-4580-8609-715f4f6e9739 Mon, 12 Aug 2024 20:35:30 -0400 New genomic predictors of relapse in childhood B-cell acute lymphoblastic leukemia uncovered
超越神经元：神经胶质细胞被认为是阿尔茨海默病的关键参与者记忆丧失、精神错乱、言语问题——阿尔茨海默病是痴呆症的最常见原因，影响着全世界约 3500 万人，而且这个数字还在不断增长。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/Beyond-neurons-Glial-cells-identified-as-key-players-in-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/Beyond-neurons-Glial-cells-identified-as-key-players-in-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=162d1d2e-7628-4de8-8f7a-88b7b42c9806 Mon, 12 Aug 2024 20:31:31 -0400 Beyond neurons: Glial cells identified as key players in Alzheimer's disease
研究人员发现细胞核可以控制眼睛和大脑发育的组织结构在加州大学圣巴巴拉分校和德累斯顿工业大学生命卓越物理集群进行的工作中，生物物理学家 Otger Campàs 和他的研究小组发现，细胞核在胚胎发育过程中控制着眼睛和脑组织的结构和力学。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/Cell-nuclei-found-to-control-tissue-architecture-in-eye-and-brain-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/Cell-nuclei-found-to-control-tissue-architecture-in-eye-and-brain-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=46cffbb0-6e2b-4b17-bc18-2f3afe2103f2 Mon, 12 Aug 2024 20:25:33 -0400 Cell nuclei found to control tissue architecture in eye and brain development
新的乳腺细胞图谱揭示了遗传血统在癌症发展中的作用印第安纳大学梅尔文和布伦西蒙综合癌症中心的研究人员完成了迄今为止最广泛的健康乳腺细胞图谱绘制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/New-breast-cell-atlas-sheds-light-on-genic-ancestrys-role-in-cancer-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/New-breast-cell-atlas-sheds-light-on-genic-ancestrys-role-in-cancer-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=15a80860-3023-4d04-9452-a23c3092779c Mon, 12 Aug 2024 20:12:39 -0400 New breast cell atlas sheds light on genetic ancestry's role in cancer development
儿童疫苗接种可节省数万亿美元的社会成本，同时防止数百万人患病和死亡对 1994 年至 2023 年间出生的儿童进行常规儿童疫苗接种已在美国预防了数百万人的疾病和死亡，节省了 5400 亿美元的直接成本和 2.7 万亿美元的社会成本。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/Childhood-vaccinations-save-trillions-in-societal-costs-while-preventing-millions-of-illnesses-and-deaths.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/Childhood-vaccinations-save-trillions-in-societal-costs-while-preventing-millions-of-illnesses-and-deaths.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aa20ce81-34b5-4463-9581-1ac73e25fe42 Mon, 12 Aug 2024 20:12:00 -0400 Childhood vaccinations save trillions in societal costs while preventing millions of illnesses and deaths
霍华德休斯医学院宣布拨款 5 亿美元支持生命科学领域人工智能驱动的项目霍华德休斯医学研究所 (Howard Hughes Medical Institute) 今天宣布推出 AI@HHMI，在未来 10 年内投资 5 亿美元，用于支持生命科学领域人工智能驱动的项目。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/Howard-Hughes-Medical-Institute-announces-24500-million-to-support-AI-driven-projects-in-life-sciences.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/Howard-Hughes-Medical-Institute-announces-24500-million-to-support-AI-driven-projects-in-life-sciences.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=634402ef-b0dd-43af-abf5-d403fef79301 Mon, 12 Aug 2024 20:08:13 -0400 Howard Hughes Medical Institute announces $500 million to support AI-driven projects in life sciences
研究发现，2023 年创纪录的高温导致欧洲超过 47,000 人死亡2023年，欧洲有超过47,000人因高温死亡，这是全球有记录以来最热的一年，也是欧洲第二热的一年。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/Record-heat-in-2023-linked-to-over-47000-deaths-in-Europe-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/Record-heat-in-2023-linked-to-over-47000-deaths-in-Europe-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b83aa3e5-d4b5-4e4f-bf18-0c1bb2faca43 Mon, 12 Aug 2024 20:04:14 -0400 Record heat in 2023 linked to over 47,000 deaths in Europe, study finds
用于协同癌症治疗的新型外泌体药物递送系统卵巢癌是全世界女性最常见的恶性肿瘤之一。与乳腺癌不同，卵巢癌缺乏早期诊断标志物，直到癌症转移时才会出现明显症状，导致卵巢癌患者的生存率较低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/Novel-exosome-based-drug-delivery-system-for-synergistic-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/Novel-exosome-based-drug-delivery-system-for-synergistic-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f44c61b9-588b-41f4-889d-b41a44ea632a Mon, 12 Aug 2024 19:58:22 -0400 Novel exosome-based drug delivery system for synergistic cancer treatment
